use_camera.description: Indicates whether the setup has a camera (true) or not (false).
use_camera.title: Use Camera

type.description: The type of camera used in the setup.
type.title: Type

frames_per_second.description: The number of frames per second of the camera.
frames_per_second.title: Frames Per Second

resolution.description: The resolution with which the camera is recording the video.
resolution.title: Resolution

codec.description: The codec used to save the video with FFMPEG.
codec.title: Codec

box_period.description: The period of the blinking of the box LED (ms).
box_period.title: Box Period

poke_period.description: The period of the blinking of the central poke LED (ms).
poke_period.title: Poke Period

iti_light.description: Indicates whether the box LED should turn of when the new trial is ready (true) or not (false).
iti_light.title: Iti Light

poke_light.description: Indicates whether the central poke LED should turn of when the new trial is ready (true) or not (false).
poke_light.title: Poke Light

fixation_light.description: Indicates whether the central poke LED should blink during fixation time (true) or not (false).
fixation_light.title: Fixation Light

penalty_light.description: Indicates whether the box LED should blink during penalty times (true) or not (false).
penalty_light.title: Penalty Light

low_to_high.description: Indicates whether the poke is a low-to-high (true) or a high-to-low (false) device.
low_to_high.title: Low To High

left_slope.description: The slope of the calibration curve of the left speaker.
left_slope.title: Left Slope

left_intercept.description: The intercept of the calibration curve of the left speaker.
left_intercept.title: Left Intercept

right_slope.description: The slope of the calibration curve of the right speaker.
right_slope.title: Right Slope

right_intercept.description: The intercept of the calibration curve of the right speaker.
right_intercept.title: Right Intercept

use_pumps.description: Indicates whether the setup uses valves (false) or Harp SyringePumps (true) for reward delivery.
use_pumps.title: Use Pumps

left_slope.description: The slope of the calibration curve of the left Harp SyringePump.
left_slope.title: Left Slope

left_intercept.description: The intercept of the calibration curve of the left Harp SyringePump.
left_intercept.title: Left Intercept

right_slope.description: The slope of the calibration curve of the right Harp SyringePump.
right_slope.title: Right Slope

right_intercept.description: The intercept of the calibration curve of the right Harp SyringePump.
right_intercept.title: Right Intercept

setup_id.description: The ID number of the setup.
setup_id.title: Setup Id

left_poke.description: Contains parameters related to the left poke.

center_poke.description: Contains parameters related to the center poke.

right_poke.description: Contains parameters related to the right poke.

speakers.description: Contains parameters related to the speakers.

lights.description: Contains parameters related to the box and poke LEDs.

syringe_pumps.description: Contains the parameters related to the SyringePumps.

sounds.description: The list containing the indexes where the non-short-duration sounds are saved in the Harp SoundCard.
sounds.title: Sounds

camera.description: Contains parameters related to the camera.
